translation.en: [kid] Whoaaa! Whoo-hoo!
♪ Ride on the Magic School Bus ♪
I knew I should have stayed home todayyyyyy!
translation.de: Ich wusste, ich hätte heute besser zu Hause bleiben sollen!

translation.en: Yeah!
Booster shutdown and separation in three... two, one...
translation.de: Booster abgeschaltet, Abwurf in drei, zwei, eins!

translation.en: Cool! Are we there, Ms. Frizzle?
translation.de: Cool! Sind wir bald da, Ms. Fissel?

translation.en: We'll have you in micro-gravity in a micro-second, Ralphie. See?
translation.de: Noch eine Mikrosekunde bis zur Mikrogravitation. Siehst du?

translation.en: The International Space Station!
[Keesha] ISS.
Which has got to stand for, "It's so spectacular!"
translation.de: Das steht bestimmt für "Ist so spektakulär"!

translation.en: [Wanda] And so big!
And coming up fast! [gasps]
Bus, do your stuff!
Less fast!
Less fast!
Still too fast!
[Ms. Frizzle] Prepare for docking!
I just have to line up the things...
translation.de: Ich muss das nur aufeinander ausrichten und...

translation.en: Oops. A little to the left. A little to the... Ohh! Ohh!
translation.de: Ich muss das nur aufeinander ausrichten und... Etwas nach links, etwas...

translation.en: [Arnold] Ms. Frizzle!
[Ms. Frizzle] OK, OK, nope. Steady as she goes. Here we go. Nope...
translation.de: Ok. Oh. Nein. Recht so. Da haben wir's. Nein.

translation.en: [Ms. Frizzle] And we're clamped in!
[Arnold] And I'm totally comfortable with our speed now.
translation.de: Jetzt bin ich zufrieden mit dem Tempo.

translation.en: -[propellant hisses] -Oh, look, we're here!
-Bull's-eye! -[kids cheering, laughing]
[laughs] I'm flying!
Well, Ralphie, because you're in micro-gravity, you're not so much flying as you are falling. Continuously.
translation.de: In der Mikrogravitation fliegt man nicht, man fällt kontinuierlich.

translation.en: You're floating because you're in continuous freefall around the Earth. That's what orbit is.
translation.de: -Im freien Fall um die Erde. -Die Umlaufbahn.

translation.en: OK, but... it's still a superpower.
translation.de: Ok, aber es ist trotzdem eine Superkraft.

translation.en: [straining] Wait for me! Why can't I move?
translation.de: Wartet! Warum kann ich mich nicht bewegen?

translation.en: Just push off of something and you'll go in the opposite direction.
translation.de: Stoß dich an irgendetwas ab, und es geht los.

translation.en: Whoaaa!
Or just grab onto the Carlos Express. Oh, yeah! Whoo-whoo!
Arnold, aren't you coming?
As soon as I figure out how to release all the extra seat belts I added.
-[kid scoffs] -What? We're 400 kilometers above the Earth.
translation.de: Was? Wir sind 400 km über der Erde.

translation.en: That's only 248 miles.
Exactly. Safety first.
This is not good.
Adventure awaits!
[exhales] Smell that fresh recycled air!
Fiona! Welcome back!
Great to see you again. Hey, guys! Good to see all of you. How are ya?
translation.de: -Schön, dich zu sehen. -Schön, euch zu sehen. Wie geht's?

translation.en: Boom, boom, and boom.
Wait. You've already been here? Of course she has.
translation.de: -Sie waren schon mal hier? -Mal wieder typisch.

translation.en: I did a four-month tour of duty up here right after my last stint with the circus.
translation.de: Nach dem Zirkus war ich hier auf einem viermonatigen Einsatz.

translation.en: Who knew the flying trapeze would prepare me for space?
translation.de: Das Trapez hat mich aufs All vorbereitet.

translation.en: And these must be the rookie astronauts we've heard so much about.
translation.de: Das sind also die jungen Astronauten.

translation.en: No, these are a different set of children. I'm kidding, yes.
translation.de: Nein, das sind andere Kinder. War ein Witz!

translation.en: These are the very first kids to board the International Space Station.
translation.de: Das sind die ersten Kinder auf der Raumstation!

translation.en: -Affirmative! -Yeah!
Commander Hadfield told us you guys did a great job at NASA space training.
translation.de: Laut Commander Hadfield war euer Training ein Erfolg.

translation.en: We all trained super hard for this mission. We are so ready for anything!
translation.de: Wir haben hart für die Mission trainiert. Wir sind bereit.

translation.en: Am I right? Totally!
But maybe not quite ready to live in micro-g. Just take it slowly. You'll get the hang of it.
translation.de: Vielleicht doch noch nicht ganz. Ihr kriegt den Dreh schon noch raus.

translation.en: All right, Fiona. Your class has the station until the next crew arrives tomorrow morning.
translation.de: Ok, Fiona. Die neue Crew löst euch morgen ab.

translation.en: -[kid 1] Cool! -[kid 2] No way! Wow!
Good luck, and have fun.
Micro-gravity is the best!
[laughs] Yeah. You can be even lazier than usual.
translation.de: Du kannst noch fauler sein als sonst.

translation.en: [laughs] I know, right? I don't even have to hold up my head.
translation.de: Ich muss nicht mal den Kopf hochhalten!

translation.en: We don't wanna be moving around in our flight suits.
[gasps] Oh! I almost forgot. Bus drone incoming!
-Hello, Itty-B! -[Itty-B beeps]
-Cool! -It's so cute!
-[kids laughing] -Nice!
What have you got there, Jyoti? A drone's-eye view.
Whatever Itty-B sees, we see on my FrizzPad.
translation.de: Wir sehen auf dem Fisspad, was Mini-B sieht.

translation.en: Is that the Bus remote, Ms. Frizzle? Yes, indeedy, it is, Arnold.
As you know, it's also the Porta-Shrinker...
-[Arthur screams] -...the Biggifier.
[Arthur gasps] Oww!
I just had this little feature installed. It's called the Shriek-a-Maker.
translation.de: Oh. Ich habe eine neue Funktion. Den Schrei-Macher.

translation.en: The what?
-[shrieking] The Shriek-a-Maker! -[screams]
I think maybe one Shriek-a-Maker is enough.
[Ms. Frizzle] If you say so. Keep this in a safe place, then.
translation.de: Wie du meinst. Dann bewahre es sicher auf.

translation.en: Before we get to work, I have something very special to show you.
translation.de: Ich muss euch etwas Besonderes zeigen.

translation.en: Follow me.
Hey, wait up!
This is my most favorite, favorite, favorite place in the Space Station.
translation.de: Das ist mein Lieblingsplatz in der Raumstation.

translation.en: [kid] Look at that!
Awesome!
Check it out!
[Wanda] It makes me feel very small.
But also connected to everything.
OK, astronauts, you all have your assigned positions.
Roll call!
Commander Keesha, reporting for duty. Wanda, Science Officer.
Jyoti, Flight Engineer.
[DA] DA, Mission Specialist. [Tim] Tim, Robotics Specialist.
Arnold, Security Officer. Everyone safe?
Good. Job done.
Carlos, Communications Officer.
And In-flight Entertainment. Good morning, ISS!
translation.de: und zuständig fürs Bordprogramm. Guten Morgen, ISS!

translation.en: Actually, days are only 90 minutes long on the station. So it's already afternoon.
translation.de: Tage auf der Station sind 90 Minuten lang, also ist es Nachmittag.

translation.en: The ISS orbits Earth 16 times every 24 hours.
translation.de: Die ISS umkreist die Erde 16 Mal am Tag.

translation.en: Which means we'll see the sun rise and set 16 times today.
translation.de: Also werden wir heute 16 Sonnenaufgänge sehen.

translation.en: Really?
And, last but not least...
Ralphie, Chief Maintenance Officer. What's a Chief Maintenance Officer?
The janitor. I'm psyched! 'Cause I get to do stuff like this.
translation.de: Der Hausmeister. Finde ich toll, weil ich das tun kann.

translation.en: [Carlos] Ralphie! What are you doing?
-That capsule is filled with... -[beeps]
...ta-da! Dirty laundry.
-Cool! -[DA] Look at that!
Awesome!
Whoa! What just happened?
translation.de: Wow! -Was war das? -Da es keine Waschmaschine gibt,

translation.en: Since there aren't any washing machines on the ISS,
translation.de: -Was war das? -Da es keine Waschmaschine gibt,

translation.en: dirty laundry goes into a capsule that we drop into Earth's atmosphere, where it burns it up as it falls.
translation.de: wird die Schmutzwäsche in die Erdatmosphäre geworfen und verglüht.

translation.en: Result!
Is that... a monogrammed hand towel?
translation.de: Ist das ein Handtuch mit Monogramm?

translation.en: Yup. Never leave Earth without one.
translation.de: Ja. Verlass die Erde nie ohne eins.

translation.en: Now to make this place smell lemon pine springtime mountain air fresh. With this!
translation.de: Gleich riecht es nach Zitrusfrische, Frühling und Bergluft.

translation.en: You know what, fun fact: they don't allow aerosol cans in space because...
translation.de: Sprühdosen sind im Weltraum nicht erlaubt, weil...

translation.en: ...of that.
-Ow! -Sorry! -Ow! -My bad!
-Ow! -Whoa!
Ow! Ralphie! Be careful.
Whew! What just happened?
In the station's micro-g, we can only really move around when we push ourselves off a surface
translation.de: Ohne Schwerkraft können wir uns nur durch Abstoßen bewegen

translation.en: or when a force pushes against us, like compressed air shooting out of an aerosol can.
translation.de: oder wenn eine Kraft wie Druckluft auf uns einwirkt.

translation.en: For every action, there's an equal and opposite reaction.
translation.de: Jede Aktion erzeugt die gleiche Gegenreaktion.

translation.en: Isn't that cool?
Now she tells me.
-Can I do it again? -We're in space, Ralphie.
translation.de: -Kann ich noch mal? -Das ist keine Übung.

translation.en: This isn't a drill. You need to be serious.
translation.de: -Kann ich noch mal? -Das ist keine Übung. -Du musst das ernst nehmen. -Ich nehme es ernst.

translation.en: Come on, I'm serious.
translation.de: -Du musst das ernst nehmen. -Ich nehme es ernst.

translation.en: When am I ever not serious?
translation.de: Nehme ich jemals etwas nicht ernst?

translation.en: Um, all those times during space training?
Hey, good job, guys.
Uh... You OK, Ralphie?
Look at me, Commander Hadfield! I'm Pinocchiooooo!
translation.de: Schauen Sie, Commander Hadfield. Ich bin Pinocchio!

translation.en: Ralphie, seriously?
I'm having a lot of fun at Space Training...
Ralphie, seriously?
[Ralphie] Pew-pew, pew-pew! Yes!
Aaah! Direct hit, but no effect.
The alien shields are too strong.
Our photon cannons are useless against a ship of this size.
translation.de: Die Photonenkanonen sind nutzlos gegen sie.

translation.en: Prepare for ramming speed!
Commander... it's been an honor.
translation.de: Commander, es war mir eine Ehre.

translation.en: What are you talking about?
For Walkerville!
-[alarm sounding] -[Hadfield] Ralphie, seriously?
OK, but now that we're actually in space, I will be super serious. Trust me.
translation.de: Aber da wir nun wirklich im Weltraum sind, werde ich es richtig ernst nehmen.

translation.en: Good. And the first step in being serious is communication.
translation.de: Gut, und der erste Schritt ist Kommunikation.

translation.en: It's important to let everyone know what you're doing at all times.
translation.de: Es ist wichtig, dass du alle wissen lässt, was du tust.

translation.en: All right. I'm scratching my armpit now because it's super itchy.
translation.de: Ich kratze mich jetzt an der Achselhöhle, weil es mich da so juckt.

translation.en: Interesting. So there's no such thing as over-communicating in space?
translation.de: Interessant. Es gibt keine Überkommunikation im All?

translation.en: Nope. See?
Even the labels here are written in both English and Russian for the crews that speak those languages.
translation.de: Schilder sind auf Englisch und Russisch, da die Crew diese Sprachen spricht.

translation.en: English-speaking astronauts learn a little Russian and Russian cosmonauts learn a little English.
translation.de: Die Astronauten machen sich mit der anderen Sprache vertraut.

translation.en: That's right, and they end up speaking a mixture of the two called "Runglish."
Cooperation and love.
I hope.
All right, class, to your stations.
[kid 2] Later!
[Like Darth Vader] Wanda, this is your destiny...
module.
It's the US laboratory where many science experiments are being run at any given time.
Sometimes the best way to understand how things work
is to look at them in a brand-new way.
Have a look at this, Science Officer Wanda. It's a tardigrade.
translation.de: Sieh mal, Wissenschaftsoffizierin Wanda, ein Bärtierchen.

translation.en: [Wanda] Ooh. I've read about tardigrades, but I've never seen one for real.
translation.de: Ich habe über Bärtierchen gelesen. Es ist das einzige Tier,

translation.en: They're the only known animals that can survive
translation.de: Ich habe über Bärtierchen gelesen. Es ist das einzige Tier, das im Weltall überleben kann.

translation.en: in the irradiated vacuum of space, right?
Which is why scientists are interested in studying them in this environment.
translation.de: Deshalb wollen Wissenschaftler es unbedingt hier erforschen.

translation.en: Whoops-a-dops! Look at the time.
translation.de: Ups! Sieh dir die Zeit an.

translation.en: It's two hairs past "I need to adjust the solar panels or we'll lose power and freeze in space" o'clock.
translation.de: Ich muss die Solarmodule neu ausrichten, damit wir nicht erfrieren.

translation.en: What are you looking at, Wanda?
See for yourself.
[Ralphie] Blecch. It looks like something I need to clean up.
It's a tardigrade, and it's cute.
Just look at those chubby legs.
Who's a cute little water animal? You. Yes, you are.
translation.de: Wer ist ein süßes Wassertierchen? Du. Ja, das bist du.

translation.en: I'm going to call you... Pinky.
Hey, who wants in on this genuine Space Ice Cream I brought?
Me-me-me-me! Blasting dirty laundry into space is hungry work.
You do know Space Ice Cream isn't actually supposed to be eaten in space, right?
translation.de: Du weißt, dass man Astronauten-Eis nicht im Weltraum isst, oder?

translation.en: Why would they call it "Space Ice Cream" if you can't eat it in space?
-Hmm. -It makes a lot of crumbs.
Ehh, I'll clean 'em up later.
Good, 'cause if those crumbs get into the ISS's delicate electronics, that would be bad.
translation.de: Gut, denn die Krümel sollten nicht in die empfindliche Elektronik gelangen.

translation.en: And really unsafe.
Is this you taking things seriously?
[mouth full] But this stuff is seriously good.
translation.de: Aber das Eis ist ernsthaft lecker.

translation.en: [groans] I'll find the portable vacuum cleaner. [Wanda] I'll help you look.
No, I'm the Chief Maintenance Officer. I'll clean up this mess.
translation.de: Nein. Ich bin der Wartungsoffizier. Ich werde sauber machen.

translation.en: Hey, Arn, that's the Porta-Shrinker, isn't it?
Yesss. Can I borrow it?
Noooooo. If I biggify these crumbs, they'll be easier to catch.
I can see the logic. But be safe, OK?
translation.de: Das ergibt Sinn, aber sei vorsichtig.

translation.en: [Jyoti] Ingenious. It worked.
Cool! Now the crumbs are the size of baseballs.
translation.de: Cool! Krümel so groß wie Baseballs.

translation.en: Batter up!
He swings.
-Hey! -St...rike!
translation.de: -Er schwingt! -Hey! Strike! Da kommt noch einer.

translation.en: Here comes another one.
It's a high fly ball! And Carlos catches it.
translation.de: Der Ball fliegt hoch, und Carlos fängt ihn.

translation.en: Over to you, Chief Maintenance Officer.
C'mon, everyone. Time to get back to work.
translation.de: Kommt, Leute. Wir haben eine Raumstation zu führen.

translation.en: We have a space station to run.
translation.de: Wir haben eine Raumstation zu führen.

translation.en: Another fine job by the Chief Maintenance Officer.
Phew. That really made me work up a sweat. Whoo!
This towel is really filling up.
I am one sweaty dude.
-[rumbling continues] -What? It's not that bad.
translation.de: Was? So schlimm ist es nicht.

translation.en: What is it, Liz?
What in the name of all that's black hole-y is that?
translation.de: Was um aller schwarzer Löcher Willen ist das?

translation.en: Let's get out of here!
What was that thing?
-It was... it was... -[bubbles gurgling] ...an alien!
translation.de: Das war... Das war ein Außerirdischer!

translation.en: Ralphie! Wanda.
You know, when I first came up here,
I tried to wash my hair using regular shampoo,
translation.de: mein Haar mit normalem Shampoo gewaschen.

translation.en: but when you try to rinse it out, the water goes everywhere.
translation.de: Aber beim Ausspülen macht man alles nass.

translation.en: -Ms... Ms... -B-b-b-big!
So now I use this special rinseless shampoo.
♪ Just rub it in your hair And leave it there ♪
-But no... -M-Monster... Bu-but...
It's "the CO2 levels need to be adjusted or we'll be in serious trouble" o'clock.
translation.de: Ich muss mich um die CO2-Werte kümmern, sonst gibt es Ärger.

translation.en: [laughs] Never a dull moment on the ISS.
I love how you don't need any chairs in space.
translation.de: Super, dass man keine Stühle braucht.

translation.en: Or even hands.
Mmm! This stew's not bad.
Who wants some macaroni and cheese, hot from the oven?
translation.de: Wer will Käsenudeln aus dem Ofen?

translation.en: -You mean macaroni and squeeze. -[Arnold sighs]
translation.de: Du meinst Makkaroni aus der Tube.

translation.en: Ralphie, what did I say about communication? "Monster" doesn't tell us...
translation.de: Ralphie, was habe ich gesagt? "Monster" sagt uns nicht...

translation.en: Big... monster!
-Space monster. -Loose in the station.
translation.de: Großes Monster! Weltraummonster! Hier auf der Station!

translation.en: OK, that's better communication. But as Commander, it's my job to...
translation.de: Ok, schon besser kommuniziert. Aber als Commander kontaktiere ich...

translation.en: -[creature snarling] -...call Mission Control!
-The rest of you... -Hide!
-Great idea, Safety Officer. -Just doing my job.
Sorry we're late for...
...whatever that is! [Tim] Run!
translation.de: Was auch immer das ist. Weg hier!

translation.en: -We're under attack! -What should we do?
[strains] Let's hide in here.
The bathroom? No way. I've seen way too many scary movies to hide in a bathroom.
translation.de: Auf keinen Fall. Ich habe zu viele Gruselfilme gesehen.

translation.en: Hang on, I'm getting a brilliant Chief Maintenance Officer idea.
translation.de: Warte. Ich habe eine geniale Hausmeister-Idee.

translation.en: Both toilets on the ISS work with a fan suction system to suck the pee and pookadumpadoody away.
translation.de: Die Toiletten haben ein Saugsystem, das Pipi und Kaka wegsaugt.

translation.en: Can we talk plumbing when we're not being hunted by a monster?
This tube is for number one and this seat is where you do number two.
translation.de: Das ist fürs Pipi. Hier wird Groß gemacht.

translation.en: I see where you're going. We could--
Suck the monster out into space-- Through the toilet. Yes!
translation.de: -Das Monster ins All. -Durch die Toilette. Aber...

translation.en: -Except. -What?
translation.de: -Das Monster ins All. -Durch die Toilette. Aber... Was?

translation.en: The monster's way too big to fit down there.
translation.de: Das Monster ist viel zu groß.

translation.en: Don't worry. I'm sure you're "flushed" with other ideas.
translation.de: Du hast doch sicher andere groß-artige Ideen.

translation.en: Now I have to go to the bathroom.
You'll have to hold it.
-Where do we hide? [screaming] -[loud slurping]
Nothing like the clean, crisp taste of water distilled from astronaut urine.
translation.de: Nichts übertrifft den frischen Geschmack von recyceltem Urin.

translation.en: -[kids scream] -Oh, come on! It's been filtered and cleaned by the water reclamation system and turned back into pure drinking water.
translation.de: Was denn? Das Wasserrecyclingsystem hat es zu Trinkwasser aufbereitet.

translation.en: Ewww! I don't know what's scarier, the monster or that fact.
translation.de: Igitt! Das ist so gruslig wie das Monster.

translation.en: -Definitely the fact. -[Ms. Frizzle slurping]
Oh! You guys, don't be so judge-y. Water treatment plants on Earth do sort of the same thing.
translation.de: Seid nicht so voreingenommen. Auf der Erde passiert das Gleiche.

translation.en: [sighs] Time for a refill.
-Uh... -Ms. Frizzle! -It's right behind us. -[kids scream]
[Ralphie] Why me, why me, why me?
Ralphie. Move!
I can't, I can't, I can't.
Wait a minute.
Clean water is essential...
[slurping] ...to life on the ISS.
Living creatures need it, no matter how small or big they may be.
translation.de: Lebewesen brauchen es, egal wie klein oder groß sie auch sind.

translation.en: Is it... Is it...
[sighs] It's gone!
Told ya you should never leave Earth without it.
translation.de: Wie gesagt, man sollte es immer dabeihaben.

translation.en: Eww. Gross!
You guys, I think our "monster" is Pinky.
translation.de: Leute, ich glaube, unser Monster ist Pinky.

translation.en: -What? -The tardigrade.
translation.de: Was? Das Bärtierchen. Ich kenne doch seine Beinchen.

translation.en: I'd know those cute, chubby legs anywhere.
translation.de: Das Bärtierchen. Ich kenne doch seine Beinchen.

translation.en: How did it get so big? As In-flight Entertainment Officer,
translation.de: -Wieso ist es so groß? -Die Kamera war an,

translation.en: I turned on the cameras to record our time here.
I can rewind the footage to see what happened.
Oh. My bad.
Keep it together, Keesha. Don't think about the giant monster. Just breathe.
translation.de: Reiß dich zusammen. Denk nicht an das Monster. Atme.

translation.en: [inhales sharply] Now send the SOS to Mission Control.
-Keesha! -[screams] Is there an intercom system? There's something I need to communicate.
translation.de: Keesha! Ist das eine Sprechanlage? Ich muss etwas durchgeben.

translation.en: [clears throat] Attention, everyone. Attention.
The monster is actually a tardigrade.
Ooh, my brilliant class does it again.
translation.de: Meine Kinder haben es wieder geschafft.

translation.en: -But aren't tardigrades microscopic? -[Itty-B beeps]
I... accidentally biggified it with the Porta-Shrinker.
Of course you did.
So here's what I'm going to do: I'm going to find the Porta-Shrinker
translation.de: -Typisch. -Ich mache Folgendes. Ich werde das Bärtierchen wieder klein machen.

translation.en: and zap the tardigrade small again.
translation.de: Ich werde das Bärtierchen wieder klein machen.

translation.en: That's actually a decent plan.
translation.de: Ja, das ist ein guter Plan.

translation.en: Meanwhile, stay away from the giant tardigrade.
translation.de: Haltet euch von dem Riesenbärtierchen fern.

translation.en: It may not be dangerous, but then again, who knows?
translation.de: Es ist nicht gefährlich, aber wer weiß?

translation.en: -[beeping] -I'm searching for "how to deal with a giant tardigrade floating around the ISS," but for some reason I'm not finding anything.
translation.de: Ich suche nach Tipps für Riesenbärtierchen, finde aber nichts.

translation.en: Unsurprising. However we can find the tardigrade with Itty-B.
translation.de: Nicht verwunderlich. Mini-B kann das Bärtierchen finden.

translation.en: We can watch through its camera.
-There it is! -What's it doing?
It's destroying the life-support systems.
But there's nothing to worry about, right? Because there's like four backup systems?
translation.de: Also kein Grund zur Sorge, oder? Weil es vier Sicherungssysteme gibt.

translation.en: Make that three.
According to my research, these systems filter air that we can breathe and water we can drink.
translation.de: Laut meinen Recherchen filtern die Systeme Luft und Wasser.

translation.en: Perplexing. It's like it's searching for something.
translation.de: Verblüffend. Es scheint etwas zu suchen.

translation.en: Yeah, fresh children to eat.
That may not be far from the truth. Some tardigrades are actually carnivorous.
translation.de: Das kann sein. Manche Bärtierchen sind Fleischfresser.

translation.en: Time to start worrying?
Negative. Ms. Frizzle would never let that thing eat us.
translation.de: Ms. Fissel würde verhindern, dass es uns frisst.

translation.en: But if it does eat you, then you have the once-in-a-lifetime chance
translation.de: Aber so hättet ihr die einmalige Chance,

translation.en: to experience being eaten by a giant tardigrade. Win-win.
translation.de: von einem Riesenbärtierchen gefressen zu werden!

translation.en: You know, this is even more exciting than the band of belligerent beetles that got loose on the station when I was here.
translation.de: Das ist ja aufregender als die aggressiven Käfer damals auf der Station.

translation.en: I'm pretty sure we got them all. -[beetle skittering] -Pretty sure.
translation.de: Wir haben sie alle eingefangen... Glaube ich.

translation.en: Um... guys? The tardigrade is on the move!
It sounds like Itty-B is trying to warn us about something.
translation.de: Das klingt, als würde Mini-B uns warnen.

translation.en: Here's Tardigrade!
Oh, you guys. Where's your sense of adventure?
translation.de: Wo ist euer Sinn für Abenteuer?

translation.en: [panting] At least we're getting... a workout running from this thing.
translation.de: Wenigstens kriegen wir so etwas Bewegung.

translation.en: Exactly.
It's especially important to exercise on the ISS.
translation.de: Bewegung ist wichtig auf der Station.

translation.en: According to my research, with less gravity to work against,
our muscles lose strength and our bones lose some density in space.
translation.de: unter anderem zu Knochen- und Muskelabbau.

translation.en: We get weaker the longer we're in space? Why does anyone come here?
translation.de: Man wird schwächer im All? Warum dann hierherkommen?

translation.en: Whoa, that was close. Where'd it go?
translation.de: -Wow, das war knapp. -Wo ist es hin?

translation.en: -Where is it? -Whoa!
Would anyone like a towel to suck up their sweat?
I've got my own, thanks.
Low gravity, no drips.
Gotta towel your own sweat off in micro-g.
So how do we get rid of this thing?
-Lasso it? -Lure it somewhere with space stew?
translation.de: -Wie werden wir das Ding los? -Lasso? Es mit Eintopf locken?

translation.en: Build a robotic power suit to wear in an epic showdown?
All great ideas, but just so you know, none of them worked on the beetles.
translation.de: Tolle Ideen, war aber wirkungslos bei den Käfern.

translation.en: There you are. I have a great idea!
translation.de: Da seid ihr ja. Ich habe eine tolle Idee.

translation.en: Maybe we don't have to get rid of the creature. Still waiting for the great idea.
translation.de: -Wir müssen das Ding nicht loswerden. -Und die tolle Idee?

translation.en: We could keep it. As a pet.
You want to keep it?
Not it, "he."
He has a name, remember? Pinky.
Probably not a good idea to keep it as a pet,
translation.de: Keine gute Idee für ein Haustier.

translation.en: and since I haven't found the Porta-Shrinker yet, I know exactly what to do.
translation.de: Da der Schrumpfer verschwunden ist, weiß ich, was zu tun ist.

translation.en: But first I need everyone on the Bus.
translation.de: Zuerst müssen alle in den Bus.

translation.en: -Where's Ralphie? -Don't worry, class, he's coming.
translation.de: Und Ralphie? Keine Sorge, er kommt.

translation.en: You can wake me when he gets here. Time for my scheduled shut-eye.
translation.de: Weckt mich dann. Zeit für mein geplantes... Weltraum-Nickerchen.

translation.en: It's a space nap.
Everyone here? Good.
So, what's the plan? Get on the Bus and leave?
-We can't just leave. -Can't we?
As Chief Safety Officer, I say we discuss the pros and cons.
translation.de: Besprechen wir die Vor- und Nachteile.

translation.en: What about Pinky?
Listen up. Here's my plan.
translation.de: Hört zu. Das ist mein Plan.

translation.en: -Ralphie! -What?
[Wanda] Ralphie, what are you doing?
Sorry, guys.
This is my mess. So I'm going to clean it up.
translation.de: Ich bringe das wieder in Ordnung.

translation.en: And I want you all to stay safe while I do it. Ralphie. Don't do this.
translation.de: -Aber ihr sollt in Sicherheit bleiben. -Tu das nicht!

translation.en: Goodbye...
my friends.
You do know we can open the door from this side too, right?
translation.de: Du weißt, dass wir die Tür öffnen können, oder?

translation.en: [Ralphie] I...
did not know that...
-[tardigrade gurgling] -...but now I do.
[various kids] Oh, no! Ralphie! Get out of there!
translation.de: -Nein! -Pass auf! -Verschwinde von da. -Es ist hinter dir!

translation.en: The tardigrade is right behind you!
[straining] The door won't open!
-Ralphie, get out of there! -[thuds]
-[kids scream] -[Ralphie] Hey, tardigrade!
-[tardigrade snarls] -I'm talking to you, you overgrown science experiment gone horribly wrong because of me.
translation.de: Ich rede mit dir, du überwuchertes, schiefgelaufenes Experiment.

translation.en: Come and get me!
-[Wanda] Ralphie! -[Carlos] Come back! It's too dangerous!
[Keesha] What are you doing, Ralphie? Communication is key, remember?
translation.de: Was tust du da? Kommunikation ist alles.

translation.en: [Wanda] Yeah, and I'm going to communicate how mad I'll be if you hurt Pinky.
translation.de: Ja, und wehe, wenn du Pinky wehtust!

translation.en: Ralphie? Ralphie!
Porta-Shrinker, Porta-Shrinker... Where's the Porta-Shrinker?
Great!
Gotta find the Porta-Shrinker before Pinky finds me.
translation.de: Ich muss den Schrumpfer finden, bevor Pinky mich findet.

translation.en: This may be the worst idea I've ever had.
translation.de: Das ist die schlimmste Idee, die ich je hatte.

translation.en: And that's really saying something.
Wha... What's that?
[sighs] I've got you. You're safe.
translation.de: Ich hab dich. Du bist sicher.

translation.en: -Don't worry, Liz. I'll... -[tardigrade snarling]
...try not to hurt your ears!
Wait, I'll just keep going the same direction,
translation.de: Warte. Ich bewege mich immer in dieselbe Richtung.

translation.en: unless I stop myself.
translation.de: Ich bewege mich immer in dieselbe Richtung.

translation.en: Must get back to the hatch...
Slowly... slowly...
Don't panic.
[straining] Come on, hatch. Open, open, open!
Yes!
Uh-oh!
Come and get me!
Actually, I got you. [Wanda] Ralphie Alessandro Giuseppe Tennelli!
translation.de: -Jetzt hab ich dich. -Ralphie Alessandro Giuseppe Tennelli.

translation.en: -Wha--? -Don't you dare hurt that poor tardigrade.
Giant tardigrades have feelings too, you know.
Feelings of anger, rage and fury!
Is it gonna eat him? I can't look.
How can Ms. Frizzle sleep at a time like this?
translation.de: Wie kann Ms. Fissel da schlafen?

translation.en: According to her schedule, it's what she's supposed to be doing right now.
translation.de: Laut ihrem Zeitplan sollte sie das jetzt tun.

translation.en: The ISS orbits Earth 16 times every 24 hours
translation.de: Die ISS umkreist die Erde 16 Mal alle 24 Stunden,

translation.en: so astronauts don't have a big block of nighttime like on Earth.
translation.de: damit die Astronauten keine lange Nacht haben.

translation.en: It's very important for astronauts to get their sleep.
Yeah, I get that's super important. Except there's a giant tardigrade loose on the station!
translation.de: Das verstehe ich, außer dass ein Riesenbärtierchen frei herumläuft!

translation.en: [kids] We're stuck in the Bus! Ms. Frizzle! Wake up! Giant tardigrade!
-[snoring] -Impressive. She is a deep sleeper.
Looks like we'll just have to figure this one out ourselves.
translation.de: Das Problem müssen wir wohl selbst lösen.

translation.en: No Porta-Shrinker in here either, and this is the end of the station.
translation.de: Kein Schrumpfer. Das ist das Ende der Station.

translation.en: If eating me will save everyone else... then go for it.
translation.de: Wenn das die anderen rettet, dann... nur zu, friss mich.

translation.en: Oh no! Liz, no!
Wanda said tardigrades are water animals, but you've been floating around for ages without any water.
translation.de: Wanda sagte, Bärtierchen sind Wassertiere, aber du bist ohne Wasser.

translation.en: You haven't been hunting us. You've been looking for water.
translation.de: Du hast uns nicht gejagt. Du hast nach Wasser gesucht.

translation.en: The water reclamation pipes are behind the life-support systems.
translation.de: Die Rohre sind bei den Lebenserhaltungssystemen.

translation.en: The water pouches... even the sweat on our faces.
It was all irresistible to you, wasn't it, big guy?
translation.de: Das war alles unwiderstehlich für dich.

translation.en: I'll take that as a yes.
translation.de: Ich deute das als ein Ja.

translation.en: Success! I've got it.
I'll go.
I'm coming, Pinky!
And Ralphie.
[Wanda] And Ralphie.
You're making me all thirsty now.
A big guy like you needs more than this.
translation.de: Ein großer Kerl wie du braucht mehr.

translation.en: Good thing water just drifts in globules in micro-g.
translation.de: Gut, dass Wasser in Tropfen umherschwebt.

translation.en: Let's shove some of these together and...
You know, you're not as gross as I thought you were.
translation.de: Du bist gar nicht so eklig.

translation.en: I take it back. You gotta be kidding.
translation.de: Ich nehme es zurück. Soll das ein Witz sein?

translation.en: Wait... is that...
the Porta-Shrinker?
You must've swallowed it.
Why in the world did you swallow the Porta-Shrinker?
translation.de: Warum hast du den Schrumpfer verschluckt?

translation.en: Yeccch! I don't have the handbook memorized, but I think this is well beyond normal Chief Maintenance Officer duties.
translation.de: Ich denke, das geht weit über die Aufgaben eines Wartungsoffiziers hinaus.

translation.en: [giggles] Doodies. I said "doodies"!
All right, let's do this!
-[tardigrade rumbling] -Wrong... button!
Wrong button, wrong button!
Nice.
[sighs] That's done.
Hey.
So's that.
Now, should I tell everyone what just happened
translation.de: Soll ich allen erzählen, was passiert ist,

translation.en: or clean up this mess first and then go tell them?
Ecch! Clean up first.
You know what this means? We get to launch more laundry.
translation.de: Du weißt, was das heißt! Wir können mehr Wäsche abwerfen!

translation.en: Pinky?
Ralphie?
Ralphie?
Oh, no!
Ralphie ejected Pinky.
I have to save him.
I'm coming for you, sweet Pinky!
Good thing tardigrades can survive in the vacuum of space.
translation.de: Zum Glück überleben Bärtierchen im Vakuum.

translation.en: Wha... Laundry? Blecch!
-But where's-- -Wanda! What are you doing?
You weren't cleared for a space walk. Get back here.
translation.de: Das darfst du nicht! Komm zurück.

translation.en: I thought... but... Pinky.
-[Ralphie] I took care of it. -No!
I mean I found the Porta-Shrinker. Pinky's small again. Microscopic. Trust me.
translation.de: Ich habe Pinky wieder klein gemacht. Mikroskopisch klein.

translation.en: Pinky's OK? Then I guess everything's tied up.
translation.de: Pinky geht's gut? Das lief ja doch wie am Schnürchen.

translation.en: [gasps] Except me. Help!
translation.de: Aber was ist meiner Schnur? Hilfe!

translation.en: -Guys. -[kids] Ralphie!
-You OK? -What's going on with the tardigrade?
No time to explain! Wanda's outside the station. She's not tethered. She's floating away!
translation.de: Keine Zeit! Wanda ist da draußen. Ohne Leine! Sie schwebt weg!

translation.en: That's definitely not safe.
If only we had something long enough to reach her. [Tim] We do.
translation.de: -Wenn wir sie nur erreichen könnten. -Können wir.

translation.en: The giant robotic arm attached to the outside of the station: Canadarm2.
translation.de: Der riesige Roboterarm an der Außenseite, Canadarm2.

translation.en: Great thinking, Robotic Specialist. You're up. Bring Wanda home.
translation.de: Danke, Robotiker. Du bist dran. Hol uns Wanda zurück!

translation.en: [Tim] Wanda!
Hang on.
OK. Remember your training. Remember your training...
Looking good, Tim.
You can do this.
I can't do this.
[Hadfield] Tim, you can do this.
I can do this. I can do this!
No!
This is not my day.
-Now what? -[Ralphie] Already on it.
I'm going to save Wanda, Chief Maintenance Officer style.
[yawning] What did I miss?
Let me guess: you thought the tardigrade wanted to eat you, but it was looking for water. It's a water animal, after all.
translation.de: Ihr dachtet, das Bärtierchen wollte euch fressen, aber es wollte Wasser.

translation.en: Ralphie found the Porta-Shrinker when the tardigrade excreted it, though I have no idea how it ended up swallowing it,
translation.de: Ralphie fand den Schrumpfer. Wer weiß, warum es ihn verschluckt hat.

translation.en: and Ralphie managed to shrink it back to its regular size.
Then he cleaned up the poo and ejected the laundry capsule with its dirty clothes but Wanda thought he'd ejected the tardigrade and went to save it,
translation.de: Er hat geputzt und Wäsche entsorgt. Wanda hielt sie für das Bärtierchen,

translation.en: neglecting to tether herself properly, so Tim used the Canadarm2 to catch her, and he did, but Wanda's tether slipped and now she's too far away to grab.
translation.de: hat sich aber nicht richtig angeleint. Tim kam zu Hilfe, aber der Gurt löste sich.

translation.en: And that's why Ralphie is trying to save Wanda. Did I get it? Was I close?
translation.de: Jetzt versucht Ralphie es. Kommt das in etwa hin?

translation.en: Oh, yep.
And look at Ralphie go. Hello, Ralphie.
translation.de: Seht euch Ralphie an. Hallo, Ralphie!

translation.en: I see you've learned a thing or two about moving around in micro-g. Oh, hi, Ms. Frizzle.
translation.de: -Du bewegst dich ja recht gut da draußen. -Hi, Ms. Fissel.

translation.en: Yeah, I know I can't move without pushing against something, so I pushed off the station to head towards Wanda.
translation.de: Ich muss mich irgendwo abstoßen, also stieß ich mich von der Station ab.

translation.en: Super Ralphie to the rescue!
No!
[Jyoti] He... he detached his tether.
[Ms. Frizzle] Of course. It's the only way to reach Wanda.
translation.de: Nur so kann er Wanda erreichen.

translation.en: Now to make this rescue smell lemon pine springtime mountain air fresh!
translation.de: Damit die Rettung nach Zitrone, Frühling und Bergluft riecht!

translation.en: Gotcha!
-All right! -Yeah!
-Good job! -Yes!
I thought you ejected Pinky.
I know. I'm sorry. If I had just told everyone what I was doing first...
translation.de: Ich hätte allen sagen sollen, was ich vorhatte...

translation.en: [Keesha] It's like I was saying...
I know, I know, "communication is key."
Aha! So you were listening. [laughs]
I'll make it up to you as soon as we're back on the station.
Thanks. Just don't do it with Space Ice Cream, OK?
translation.de: Danke. Nur nicht mit Astronauten-Eis, ok?

translation.en: I won't. There's none left.
-[Wanda] Uh-oh! -[Ralphie] Ah, well. No problem. I'll just...
translation.de: Na ja. Kein Problem. Und jetzt...

translation.en: ...drift helplessly into space. The can's empty!
translation.de: ...treiben wir im Weltraum. Die Dose ist leer.

translation.en: Tim, do something!
Hang on, guys!
[Tim] Oh no, they're too far out!
translation.de: Oh nein! Sie sind zu weit weg!

translation.en: [Ralphie] And there's nothing left for us to push off of.
For every action, there is an equal and opposite reaction.
translation.de: Jede Aktion erzeugt die gleiche Gegenreaktion.

translation.en: Ralphie, there is one thing left for us to push off of...
translation.de: Es gibt eine Sache, an der wir uns abstoßen können.

translation.en: each other.
Wanda! No!
Nooooo!
I'm sorry, Ralphie, but there was no other way.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, Ralphie. Ich hatte keine andere Wahl!

translation.en: Gotcha!
But-but I don't have Wanda!
What do we do? We need a plan B!
translation.de: Und nun? Wir brauchen einen Plan B.

translation.en: Plan B? Plan B...
[gasps] Itty-B!
[Jyoti] Itty-B to the rescue.
All right!
Here we come.
[Tim] You did it! Good job.
-Awesome -Thanks, guys.
[Ms. Frizzle] Well done, class.
In a very short time, you've learned how to live and move in space.
translation.de: Ihr habt gelernt, im Weltraum zu leben.

translation.en: And now it's time for...
[Ralphie] Repairing the damage to the Space Station.
We have some serious work to do. Well said, Chief Maintenance Officer Ralphie.
translation.de: -Wir haben Arbeit vor uns. -Gut gesagt, Wartungsoffizier Ralphie.

translation.en: All of the life-support systems and their backups are online.
Whew. That's a relief.
And I replenished some of our water supply. You're welcome.
You know, this is good.
Crisp and clean.
Here's a little for you too, big guy.
[Ms. Frizzle] Well, look at that.
Another Soyuz spacecraft is here with our replacement crew.
[kids] Commander Hadfield?!
Great to see you again, kids. Hello, Ralphie.
Hi! [chuckles]
So, how was your time on the ISS? Anything unusual happen?
translation.de: Wie war es? Ist etwas Ungewöhnliches passiert?

translation.en: nothing too unusual... for us.
Belligerent beetles?
Even better.
All present and accounted for?
-Let's do this! -We're ready.
-[Itty-B beeps] -[Jyoti] Wait for Itty-B.
All right, then.
And we're off!
I can't say I'm sad to be going home. I am. I was just getting good at moving around in micro-g.
translation.de: -Traurig bin ich nicht gerade. -Ich schon. Ich hatte mich eingewöhnt.

translation.en: I don't know about anyone else, but when I get back,
I'm going to sleep for 12 hours straight.
Concur. [yawns]
Looks like Ralphie's already started.
[snorts] Of course you can... share my sandwich, Pinky.
translation.de: Natürlich kriegst du was von meinem Sandwich, Pinky.

translation.en: He got so good at communicating, he's even doing it in his sleep.
translation.de: Er kommuniziert so gut, er tut es sogar im Schlaf.

translation.en: Bus, do your stuff!
For me?
Hello. Commander Hadfield here. How can I help?
[kid] Hello, Commander Hadfield.
When the kids arrived at the ISS, they seemed pretty good at getting around in micro-gravity.
translation.de: Die Kinder sind gut in der Mikrogravitation zurechtgekommen.

translation.en: Is it really that easy?
Well, many astronauts need a few days to get used to life in micro-g when arriving at the ISS.
translation.de: Viele Astronauten brauchen ein paar Tage, um sich daran zu gewöhnen.

translation.en: Some even feel "space sick," which is a lot like feeling sea sick.
translation.de: Manche werden raumkrank, das ist wie seekrank.

translation.en: Are you OK, Liz?
It takes practice and some particular techniques. The astronauts use hand holds to move ourselves around.
translation.de: Man braucht Übung und gewisse Methoden. Beim Bewegen helfen Haltegriffe.

translation.en: And when astronauts need to stand still,
they use foot straps to hold their feet in place.
[kid] If things go wrong on the ISS, like electrical systems being destroyed
translation.de: Würde es auffallen, wenn elektrische Systeme durch ein Bärtierchen zerstört würden?

translation.en: by a humongous tardigrade, wouldn't NASA or someone notice?
translation.de: wenn elektrische Systeme durch ein Bärtierchen zerstört würden?

translation.en: Absolutely. The ISS is in constant contact with space agencies around the Earth.
translation.de: Ja. Die ISS steht in ständigem Kontakt mit der Erde.

translation.en: Every little detail aboard the ISS,
from the functioning of the life support systems to what the astronauts eat, is closely monitored.
translation.de: wie die Lebenserhaltungssysteme, sogar was die Astronauten essen.

translation.en: If you tried to sneak Space Ice Cream aboard... -[buzzer sounds] -...they'd know.
translation.de: Würde man Astronauten-Eis an Bord schmuggeln... wüssten sie das.

translation.en: But even if the engineers on Earth know what's going on in the ISS,
translation.de: Selbst wenn die Ingenieure informiert sind,

translation.en: it's still up to us to do repairs and maintenance and keep the ISS in working order.
translation.de: die Wartungsarbeiten müssen trotzdem wir durchführen.

translation.en: [kid] Ms. Frizzle was exercising to prevent muscle and bone density loss
translation.de: Ms. Fissel hat trainiert, um Muskel- und Knochenschwund zu verhindern, warum passiert das?

translation.en: while visiting the ISS. But why would that happen?
translation.de: um Muskel- und Knochenschwund zu verhindern, warum passiert das?

translation.en: Without gravity pulling us downwards in space, our bodies do a lot less work supporting themselves.
translation.de: Ohne Schwerkraft arbeiten unsere Körper viel weniger im Weltall

translation.en: And when you don't use your muscles, you lose them.
So, astronauts need to stay on top of their workout regimens,
exercising on specially adapted machines to keep their muscles and their bones in their pre-flight condition.
translation.de: an speziellen Maschinen trainieren, um ihre Muskeln und Knochen zu erhalten.

translation.en: I'd better start training if I'm going to be an astronaut one day.
translation.de: Dann sollte ich anfangen zu trainieren.

translation.en: Thanks, Commander Hadfield! Goodbye!
Bye-bye.
Nighty-night.
-[horn honks] -[Ms. Frizzle] Seat belts, everyone!
[Arnold] Please let this be a normal field trip!
translation.de: Lass es ein normaler Ausflug sein!

translation.en: -[Wanda] With the Frizz? -[kids] No way!
♪ Oh, cruising on down Main Street ♪
♪ You're relaxed and feeling good ♪
♪ Next thing that you know ♪ -♪ You're seeing... ♪ -[Ms. Frizzle] Whoo-hooo! ♪ Octopus in the neighborhood! ♪
translation.de: An der nächsten Ecke seht ihr Riesenkraken aus der Nachbarschaft

translation.en: ♪ Surfing on a soundwave ♪
-♪ Or swinging through the stars ♪ -Yee-ha!
♪ Take a left at your intestine ♪ ♪ Take your second right past Mars ♪
translation.de: Mach 'nen Abstecher zur Venus Zum Mars ist es nicht fern

translation.en: ♪ On the Magic School Bus ♪
-♪ Navigate a nostril ♪ -[Ralphie sneezes]
♪ Climb on the Magic School Bus ♪
-♪ Spank a plankton, too ♪ -[Wanda] Take that!
♪ On our Magic School Bus ♪
♪ Raft a river of lava ♪
♪ On the Magic School Bus ♪
♪ Such a fine thing to do ♪
♪ So strap your bones right to the seat ♪
♪ Come on in and don't be shy ♪
♪ Just to make your day complete ♪ ♪ You might get baked into a pie ♪
translation.de: Gebt acht, sonst seid ihr bald Ein, zwei Kuchen oder mehr

translation.en: ♪ On the Magic School Bus ♪
♪ Step in, step in, step inside ♪
♪ It's a wilder ride, come on! ♪
♪ Ride on the Magic School Bus! ♪
